CustomField.description: Number of days from Announcement Closed to the Certificate Issued
CustomField.formula: IF(IF( Certificate_Issue_Date__c - Announcement_Close_Date__c <0,null,Certificate_Issue_Date__c - Announcement_Close_Date__c)>999,NULL,IF( Certificate_Issue_Date__c - Announcement_Close_Date__c <0,null,Certificate_Issue_Date__c - Announcement_Close_Date__c))
CustomField.label: # Days Certificate Issuance
